text: Anthony Robert Graziani (born December 23, 1973) used to be an American football quarterback who played for the Atlanta Falcons in the National Football League (NFL). ==Other websites== * Tony Graziani on Pro Football Reference * Tony Graziani on databasefootball.com * Tony Graziani at ArenaFan Online * Tony Graziani at The Football Database Category:1973 births Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Living people
title: Tony Graziani
